text: Thomas Edison announced his invention of the phonograph, a machine that could record and play sound.

The Annalen Der Physik published Albert Einstein's paper, entitled "Does the Inertia of a Body Depend Upon Its Energy Content?" The paper revealed the relationship between energy and mass. You know the relationship as E = mc^2.
The first permanent ARPANET link was established between the Interface Message Processor or IMP at UCLA and the IMP at the Stanford Research Institute.
